original_text: Once you were alienated from God and were enemies in your minds because of your evil behavior.
korean_text: 전에 악한 행실로 멀리 떠나 마음으로 원수가 되었던 너희를

sentences.original_text: Once you were alienated from God
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 한 때는 하나님과 멀어져 있었고

sentences.original_text: and were enemies in your minds
